## utils.Metrics interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface Metrics 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [absoluteLeft](./blockly.utils.metrics.absoluteleft.md) |  | number | Left-edge of the visible portion of the workspace, relative to the blocklyDiv. |
|  [absoluteTop](./blockly.utils.metrics.absolutetop.md) |  | number | Top-edge of the visible portion of the workspace, relative to the blocklyDiv. |
|  [contentHeight](./blockly.utils.metrics.contentheight.md) |  | number | Height of the content. |
|  [contentLeft](./blockly.utils.metrics.contentleft.md) |  | number | Left-edge of the content relative to the workspace origin. |
|  [contentTop](./blockly.utils.metrics.contenttop.md) |  | number | Top-edge of the content, relative to the workspace origin. |
|  [contentWidth](./blockly.utils.metrics.contentwidth.md) |  | number | Width of the content. |
|  [flyoutHeight](./blockly.utils.metrics.flyoutheight.md) |  | number | Height of the flyout if it is always open. Otherwise zero. |
|  [flyoutWidth](./blockly.utils.metrics.flyoutwidth.md) |  | number | Width of the flyout if it is always open. Otherwise zero. |
|  [scrollHeight](./blockly.utils.metrics.scrollheight.md) |  | number | Height of the scroll area. |
|  [scrollLeft](./blockly.utils.metrics.scrollleft.md) |  | number | Left-edge of the scroll area relative to the workspace origin. |
|  [scrollTop](./blockly.utils.metrics.scrolltop.md) |  | number | Top-edge of the scroll area, relative to the workspace origin. |
|  [scrollWidth](./blockly.utils.metrics.scrollwidth.md) |  | number | Width of the scroll area. |
|  [svgHeight](./blockly.utils.metrics.svgheight.md) |  | number | Height of the Blockly div (the view + the toolbox, simple of otherwise). |
|  [svgWidth](./blockly.utils.metrics.svgwidth.md) |  | number | Width of the Blockly div (the view + the toolbox, simple or otherwise). |
|  [toolboxHeight](./blockly.utils.metrics.toolboxheight.md) |  | number | Height of the toolbox, if it exists. Otherwise zero. |
|  [toolboxPosition](./blockly.utils.metrics.toolboxposition.md) |  | number | Top, bottom, left or right. Use TOOLBOX\_AT constants to compare. |
|  [toolboxWidth](./blockly.utils.metrics.toolboxwidth.md) |  | number | Width of the toolbox, if it exists. Otherwise zero. |
|  [viewHeight](./blockly.utils.metrics.viewheight.md) |  | number | Height of the visible portion of the workspace. |
|  [viewLeft](./blockly.utils.metrics.viewleft.md) |  | number | Left-edge of the visible portion of the workspace, relative to the workspace origin. |
|  [viewTop](./blockly.utils.metrics.viewtop.md) |  | number | Top-edge of the visible portion of the workspace, relative to the workspace origin. |
|  [viewWidth](./blockly.utils.metrics.viewwidth.md) |  | number | Width of the visible portion of the workspace. |
